resume.title: My Journey
resume.paragraph1: I began my development journey over {years} years ago, starting with frontend development and gradually expanding into full-stack engineering. My passion for clean code and system design led me to deeply study architectural patterns and Domain-Driven Design.
resume.paragraph2: Today, I specialize in building microservices architectures, developing real-time applications, and creating scalable systems that stand the test of time. I strongly believe in the power of thoughtful design and clean abstractions.
resume.paragraph3: Beyond coding, I enjoy sharing knowledge through writing, contributing to open-source projects, and mentoring junior developers. The web is constantly evolving — and so am I.
